spatial_accuracy.notes: Major spatial failures: The balcony area has been transformed into an enclosed room with windows. Bed 4 and the Activity area are merged/misidentified. The stair landing is incorrectly scaled and oriented.

structural_fidelity.notes: Severe errors in adjacency; the hallway structure is broken. The WC room is replaced by an generic door leading to nowhere. Wall thickness is inconsistent with the floor plan's load-bearing representation.

furniture_mapping.notes: Beds are hallucinated as wall-mounted panels or incorrectly oriented. The sofa from the Activity room is moved to a different wing. Incorrect scale for most assets.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Good lighting and clean isometric rendering. The clay-style materials are visually pleasing despite the architectural inaccuracy.

detected_errors.description: Missing specific WC and linen storage compartments.
Misplaced Activity room furniture and bathroom fixtures.
Incorrect door swings and stair orientation compared to source 2D plan.
Severe proportion distortion of the balcony/outdoor living space.
Hallucinated exterior windows on the left-side wall and non-existent furniture types.
